title: Bug 115960 - Datetime values retrieved from table show different formats in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: When retrieving datetime values from a table, they are displayed in different formats in dynamic text items and data/text items.
EB: The datetime values retrieved from the table should be displayed in the same format in both dynamic text items and data/text items.
SR: To reproduce the issue:1. Retrieve datetime values from a table.2. Check the format of the datetime values in both dynamic text items and data/text items.
